[[Version 1.5]]
*The description for Xingqiu's Constellation Lv. 6 "Hence, Call Them My Own Verses" was changed:
**{{Color|New description}}: Activating 2 of [[Guhua Sword: Raincutter]]'s sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.
**{{Color|Old description}}: Activating 2 of [[Guhua Sword: Raincutter]]'s sword rain attacks greatly increases the DMG of the third. Xingqiu regenerates 3 Energy when sword rain attacks hit opponents.

[[Version 1.0]]
*Hence, Call Them My Own Verses was released.
